query: Who are the pitchers with the number before and after Taishō Tamai's number as of July 2023? Give them to me in the form Pitcher Before, Pitcher After, use their last names only, in Roman characters.

used_evidence: Taishō Tamai is a pitcher for the Hokkaido Nippon Ham Fighters, wearing number 19.
Tamai notched 8 holds with a 3.16 ERA in 2021, and he was 6th in holds (tied with Naoki Miyanishi).

tasks.description: Найти информацию о Taishō Tamai и его номере, а также о питчерах до и после него по состоянию на июль 2023 года.

result.query: Найти информацию о Taishō Tamai и его номере, а также о питчерах до и после него по состоянию на июль 2023 года.

facts.fact: Taishō Tamai is a pitcher for the Hokkaido Nippon Ham Fighters, wearing number 19.
He was born on June 16, 1992, in Tokoro District, Hokkaido, Japan.
As of the end of the 2023 season, Tamai has a win-loss record of 10-15 and an ERA of 3.15.
In the 2023 season, Tamai achieved an ERA of 2.63 with 10 holds in 50 games.
Tamai has recorded a total of 72 holds and 2 saves in his career.

sources.title: Taisho Tamai - BR Bullpen - Baseball-Reference.com
sources.snippet:
The Hokkaido native collected 21 holds with a 3.46 ERA in 49 games in 2020, and he was 6th in holds (tied with Naoki Miyanishi). Tamai notched 8 holds with a 3.16 ERA in 2021, and his ERA was 3.35 with 19 holds in 50 games in 2022. He lowered his ERA to 2.63 in 50 games with 10 holds in 2023, but he stayed in the minors for the entire 2024 season due to disc herniation.

Tamai's repertoire features a fastball that peaks at 94.4 mph, a slider, forkball, cutter and a changeup. As of 2024, he was 10-15 with a 3.15 ERA, collected 72 holds and 3 saves in 328 appearances, struck out 175 and pitched
